edu.purdue.cc.bionet.ui.layout
Class LayoutAnimator<V,E>

java.lang.Object
  edu.purdue.cc.bionet.ui.layout.LayoutAnimator<V,E>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FRLayoutAnimator
public abstract class LayoutAnimator<V,E>
extends Object
implements Runnable

An abstract class for animating the JUNG layouts.

getMap

protected HashMap<V,PolarPoint2D> getMap()
Returns a HasMap of each vertex in the graph and it's location as a PolarPoint2D. Each PolarPoint2D has it's origin at (0,0)

Returns:
A HashMap containing the vertices and their locations.

getEdges

protected Collection<E> getEdges()
Returns all edges contained in the graph.

Returns:
A collection containing the edges.

isRepulsedBy

protected boolean isRepulsedBy(V v1,
                               V v2)
Determines whether the 2 vertices are repulsed by one another. Any methods overriding this method should not be order-dependent. This implementation returns true unless v1 == v2.

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
True if the 2 vertices are affected by one another.

isAttractedBy

protected boolean isAttractedBy(V v1,
                                V v2)
Determines whether the 2 vertices are attracted to one another. Any methods overriding this method should not be order-dependent.

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
True if the 2 vertices are affected by one another.

getAttraction

protected abstract double getAttraction(V v1,
                                        V v2)
Returns the attraction force between two vertices. When repulsion - attraction is negative, the vertices are not affected.

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
The attraction force.

getRepulsion

protected abstract double getRepulsion(V v1,
                                       V v2)
Returns the repulsion force between 2 vertices. In the default implementation this is a constant.

Parameters:
v1 - The first vertex.
v2 - The second vertex.
Returns:
The repulsion force between two vertices.
